title: XSS, SSH, FTP, and EternalBlue Exploitation Challenge
description: Explore a range of vulnerabilities across multiple services in this complex CTF challenge.
hints: The web application might echo user inputs unsafely.
Try default credentials for accessing SSH and FTP.
EternalBlue requires Metasploit or similar tools to exploit.
learningObjectives: Understand and exploit cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.
Learn to identify and attack services with weak credentials.
Execute a real-world attack using EternalBlue.
